mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) as count,create_time as createTime ,sum(final_price) as amount FROM orders WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY create_time order by create_time desc ;

SELECT COUNT(o.id) as count, s.spu_name as spuName, sum(o.final_price) as amount, p.category_name as category FROM xc_trade.order_details o, xc_product.standard_product_unit s, xc_product.category p where o.spu_id = s.id and s.category_id = p.id GROUP BY o.spu_id order by count desc ;

SELECT p.category_name AS category, COUNT( o.id ) AS count, SUM( o.final_price ) AS amount FROM xc_trade.order_details o, xc_product.standard_product_unit s, xc_product.category p WHERE o.spu_id = s.id and s.category_id = p.id GROUP BY s.category_id
